summary.span: Obtains information about the COM+ object context.

span.span: Obtains information about the COM+ object context.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用來取得 COM + 內容資訊的慣用的類別。 is the preferred class to use for obtaining COM+ context information. 因為這個類別的成員都`static`(`shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，則不需要使用之前先將它執行個體化。Because the members of this class are all `static` (`shared` in Visual Basic), it is not necessary to instantiate it before using them. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建立交易式。The following code example demonstrates how to use to create a transactional . summary.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.

value.span: 如果物件是停用此方法會傳回。否則， 。

span.span: if the object is to be deactivated when the method returns; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM +`done`元決定多久物件仍會維持使用中之後完成其工作，而且可能會影響交易的持續時間。The COM+ `done` bit determines how long the object remains active after finishing its work and can affect the duration of a transaction. 當方法呼叫傳回時，COM + 會檢查`done`位元。When a method call returns, COM+ inspects the `done` bit. 如果`done`個位元都是`true`，COM + 停用該物件。If the `done` bit is `true`, COM+ deactivates the object. 如果`done`個位元都是`false`，物件不會停用。If the `done` bit is `false`, the object is not deactivated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以確保方法呼叫之後停用。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to ensure that a is deactivated after a method call. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]

exception.span: There is no COM+ context available.

span.span: There is no COM+ context available.

span.span: The platform is not Windows 2000 or later.

summary.span: Sets both the bit and the bit to in the COM+ context.

span.span: Sets both the bit and the bit to in the COM+ context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果系統詢問，COM + 內容投票中止目前的交易，但是方法返回時不停用的物件。If asked, the COM+ context votes to abort the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法。The following code example calls the method. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesContextUtil#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesContextUtil/VB/class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks COM + 內容要求，如果將會認可目前交易，但不是會在方法傳回時停用物件。If asked, the COM+ context will commit the current transaction, but the object is not deactivated on method return. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法。The following code example calls the method. Public Shared Property MyTransactionVote As TransactionVote

member this.MyTransactionVote : System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionVote with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.

span.span: Gets or sets the bit in the COM+ context.
One of the values, either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`Commit`，COM +`consistent`位元設為`true`及認可交易表決 COM + 內容。When is set to `Commit`, the COM+ `consistent` bit is set to `true` and the COM+ context votes to commit the transaction. 如果設`Abort`、`consistent`位元設為`false`和 COM + 內容投票中止交易。If is set to `Abort`, the `consistent` bit is set to `false` and the COM+ context votes to abort the transaction. 預設值`consistent`個位元都是`true`。The default value of the `consistent` bit is `true`. `consistent`元將轉換投票，以認可或中止的交易中執行，而`done`元終結投票。The `consistent` bit casts a vote to commit or abort the transaction in which it executes, and the `done` bit finalizes the vote. COM + 會檢查`consistent`位元時`done`位元設為`true`在方法呼叫傳回，或該物件會停用。COM+ inspects the `consistent` bit when the `done` bit is set to `true` on a method call return or when the object deactivates. 雖然物件`consistent`元中可能會改變重複每個方法呼叫，只有最後一個變更的計數。Although an object's `consistent` bit can change repeatedly within each method call, only the last change counts. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以建立交易式。The following code example demonstrates how to use property to create a transactional . [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]
